title: Fiddle Fear Possible Bug
body: I was playing a game against a Warring Kingdoms Xin Zhao, and every time I feared him he would continue to auto-attack and execute his knock up after the debuff sign was over his head - Bug?

replies.body: Fear makes your enemies run away from you. It'd be pretty obvious if the fear was bugged or not, Xin wouldn't even be in ranged to attack you at all.
That's sweet. It may have coincided with Xin Zhao's loss of his ability to knock up enemies at all.
